nodes.documentation:
@dev The Atola constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than thoses in the machineAddresses list
nodes.name: onlyBtm

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to add a trusted BTM address
@param _machineAddress The address of the BTM
nodes.name: addMachine

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to remove a trusted BTM address
@param _machineAddress The address of the BTM
nodes.name: removeMachine

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the info of machine by index
nodes.name: getMachine
modifyBtm

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to add a trusted token address
@param _token The address of the token contract (warning: make sure it's compliant)
nodes.name: addToken

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to remove a supported token
@param _tokenAddress The address of the token contract
nodes.name: removeToken
fiatToEth
fiatToBaseTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to withdraw eth from the contract to the owner address
@param _amount Amount of of eth to withdraw (in wei)
nodes.name: withdrawEth

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the owner to withdraw tokens from the contract to the owner address
@param _amount Amount of of tokens to withdraw (in wei)
nodes.name: withdrawBaseTokens
withdrawTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows owner to lookup token balance of contract
nodes.name: tokenBalanceAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows owner to lookup eth balance of contract
nodes.name: ethBalanceAmount
refund
ethToFiat

nodes.documentation:
@dev Shows the amount of ETH from customer pending sale
@param _user Customer crypto address
nodes.name: amountForAddress

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback payable function.  When customer send eth to the contract take note so we can use it to process a transaction.

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback payable function.  When customer send eth to the contract take note so we can use it to process a transaction.

addMachine(address).details: Allows the owner to add a trusted BTM address

addToken(address).details: Allows the owner to add a trusted token address

params._token: The address of the token contract (warning: make sure it's compliant)

amountForAddress(address).details: Shows the amount of ETH from customer pending sale

constructor.details: The Atola constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender account.

ethBalanceAmount().details: Allows owner to lookup eth balance of contract

ethToFiat(address,uint256).details: Allows customer to sell eth (needs to have already sent eth to the contract).  Called by the machine.

fiatToBaseTokens(uint256,address).details: Allows the machine to submit a fiat -> basetoken order

params._amountFiat: Amount of fiat machine reports to have recieved (18 decimal places)

fiatToEth(uint256,uint256,address).details: Allows the machine to submit a fiat -> eth order

params._amountFiat: Amount of fiat machine reports to have recieved (18 decimal places)

getMachine(uint256).details: Get the info of machine by index

modifyBtm(address,uint256,uint256).details: Allows the owner to add/remove a trusted BTM address

params._buyFee: Default buy fee on this machine
params._sellFee: Default sell fee on this machine

refund(address,uint256).details: Allows customer to claim refund if order hasn't been processed (TO-DO add a delay to this to avoid double spend race)

removeMachine(address).details: Allows the owner to remove a trusted BTM address

removeToken(address).details: Allows the owner to remove a supported token

params._tokenAddress: The address of the token contract

tokenBalanceAmount().details: Allows owner to lookup token balance of contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawBaseTokens(uint256).details: Allows the owner to withdraw tokens from the contract to the owner address

params._amount: Amount of of tokens to withdraw (in wei)

withdrawEth(uint256).details: Allows the owner to withdraw eth from the contract to the owner address

params._amount: Amount of of eth to withdraw (in wei)

withdrawTokens(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to withdraw tokens from the contract to the owner address

params._amount: Amount of of tokens to withdraw (in wei)
